class CodecManager

Detailed Description

Abstract audio capturer & encoder base class. The sub-classes of this class provide the actual audio encoder functionality API. The AudioCapturerEncoder sub-class instances are accessed by the clients via the CodecManager API.
See also:
CodecManager::ObtainDecoder

CodecManager::ReleaseDecoder

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* AudioCapturerEncoder::CbReady)(void *context)
 

Callback function which is called when the audio capturer encoder is ready with the encoded data.

Parameters:
context A context (e.g. this pointer) that has been passed to the CodecDevice object when AudioCapturerEncoder::RegisterCallbackFunctions function has been invoked.
See also:
RegisterCallbackFunctions

Member Function Documentation

virtual void AudioCapturerEncoder::Close (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Closes and releases the audio capturer encoder. This method should be invoked as soon as the audio capturer encoder is not needed anymore to allow other audio capturer encoder to access the resources.

See also:
Open

Implemented in AtiAudioCapturerEncoder.

virtual ResultType AudioCapturerEncoder::ConfigureAAC (  AacFormat  aac_encoding_format,
UINT16  sampling_rate,
EncQualityConfig  quality_config,
MonoSteroConfig  monostero_config,
UINT32  max_buffer_size
)  [pure virtual]
 

Configures the AudioCapturerEncoder device for AMR type.

Parameters:
aac_encoding_format Requested AAC encoding format.
sampling_rate Sampling rate.
quality_config Recording quality, will be used to adjust recording bit rate.
monostero_config Mono/Stero configuration.
max_buffer_size Maximum size of buffers to be provided.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
RegisterCallbackFunctions

Implemented in AtiAudioCapturerEncoder.

Configures the AudioCapturerEncoder device for AAC type.

Parameters:
amr_if_format Requested AMR I/F.
quality_config Recording quality, will be used to adjust recording bit rate.
dtx_config Specifies if DTX is enabled or disabled.
max_buffer_size Maximum size of buffers to be provided.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.

Implemented in AtiAudioCapturerEncoder.

virtual ResultType AudioCapturerEncoder::Open (  AudioChannel &  audio_channel  )  [pure virtual]
 

Opens the audio encoder. In general, when a capturer encoder is opened, it is reserved for the caller and cannot be used by another caller. Thus, as soon as the audio capturer encoder is not needed anymore, it shall be released by using Close.

Parameters:
audio_channel On return, the audio channel ID.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
Close

Implemented in AtiAudioCapturerEncoder.

virtual ResultType AudioCapturerEncoder::RegisterCallbackFunctions (  void *  context,
CbReady  cb_data_available
)  [pure virtual]
 

Register callback functions.

Parameters:
context A context (e.g. this pointer) that is valid for all callback functions registered with this instance of the AudioDecoderRenderer. This context is then passed as an argument of all callback functions invoked by the AudioCapturerEncoder.
cb_data_available A pointer to a callback function that is invoked by the AudioCapturerEncoder when a frame has been encoded and the data available.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
CbReady

CodecDevice::CbResult
